  • Uses of SourceDescriptor in org.hibernate.tool.schema.spi

    Subinterfaces of SourceDescriptor in org.hibernate.tool.schema.spi
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    JpaTargetAndSourceDescriptor
    JPA ties the notion of SourceDescriptor and TargetDescriptor together: meaning that a SourceDescriptor is specific to a given TargetDescriptor.
